query carts ($after: String, $first: Int, $storeId: String, $userId: String, $currencyCode: String, $cultureName: String, $cartType: String, $filter: String, $sort: String) {

query categories ($after: String, $first: Int, $storeId: String, $cultureName: String, $userId: String, $currencyCode: String, $query: String, $filter: String, $fuzzy: Boolean, $fuzzyLevel: Int, $facet: String, $sort: String, $categoryIds: [String]) {
    categories (after: $after, first: $first, storeId: $storeId, cultureName: $cultureName, userId: $userId, currencyCode: $currencyCode, query: $query, filter: $filter, fuzzy: $fuzzy, fuzzyLevel: $fuzzyLevel, facet: $facet, sort: $sort, categoryIds: $categoryIds) {
        edges {
            cursor
            node {
                code
                hasParent
                id
                images {
                    cultureName
                    group
                    id
                    name
                    relativeUrl
                    sortOrder
                    url
                }
                imgSrc
                level
                name
                outline
                outlines {
                    items {
                        id
                        name
                        seoObjectType
                    }
                }
                parent {
                    code
                    hasParent
                    id
                    images {
                        cultureName
                        group
                        id
                        name
                        relativeUrl
                        sortOrder
                        url
                    }
                    imgSrc
                    level
                    name
                    outline
                    parent {
                        code
                        hasParent
                        id
                        imgSrc
                        level
                        name
                        outline
                        path
                        slug
                    }
                    path
                    seoInfo {
                        id
                        imageAltDescription
                        isActive
                        languageCode
                        metaDescription
                        metaKeywords
                        name
                        objectId
                        objectType
                        pageTitle
                        semanticUrl
                        storeId
                    }
                    slug
                }
                path
                seoInfo {
                    id
                    imageAltDescription
                    isActive
                    languageCode
                    metaDescription
                    metaKeywords
                    name
                    objectId
                    objectType
                    pageTitle
                    semanticUrl
                    storeId
                }
                slug
            }
        }
        items {
            code
            hasParent
            id
            images {
                cultureName
                group
                id
                name
                relativeUrl
                sortOrder
                url
            }
            imgSrc
            level
            name
            outline
            parent {
                code
                hasParent
                id
                imgSrc
                level
                name
                outline
                path
                slug
            }
            path
            seoInfo {
                id
                imageAltDescription
                isActive
                languageCode
                metaDescription
                metaKeywords
                name
                objectId
                objectType
                pageTitle
                semanticUrl
                storeId
            }
            slug
        }
        pageInfo {
            endCursor
            hasNextPage
            hasPreviousPage
            startCursor
        }
        totalCount
    }
}

exec: pm.test("Default sorting should be  same as SCORE:ASC", function () {
pm.expect(item).to.be.equal("DJI Spreading Wings S1000+ Professional Octocopter");
pm.expect(item).to.be.equal("3DR X8-M Octocopter for Visual-Spectrum Aerial Maps (915 MHz)");
pm.test("Sort by field in index", function () {
pm.expect(item).to.be.equal("3DR X8-M Octocopter for Visual-Spectrum Aerial Maps (915 MHz)");
pm.expect(item).to.be.equal("DJI Spreading Wings S1000+ Professional Octocopter");
